scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend/express
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n fastapi,express,frontend -c blue,magenta,green "npm:dev:fastapi" "npm -w backend/express run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:resilient: concurrently --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 2000 -n fastapi,express,frontend -c blue,magenta,green "npm:dev:fastapi" "npm -w backend/express run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev"
